basics.name: Gregorio Luna
basics.label: Operations Manager
basics.summary: Experienced client service professional accustomed to managing teams functioning in a fast-paced environment in support of multiple products across various business units. Solid background in building strong and effective teams

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed a team of four client service officers responsible for day-to-day operations and onboarding process. Directed and supervised the daily activities of the teams with primary focus in enhancing the client's experience, mitigating risk, and identifying areas of improvement.

Managed a team of eight client service officers servicing our base of Commercial Real Estate clients, Mortgage Servicers, and Regulated Cash. Serviced a portfolio of 300 clients with deposits in excess of 80 billion.
highlights: Increased staff performance accuracy levels to 99%

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised a team of seven client service professionals focused in delivering excellent client service, improving processes, and leveraging technology. Partnered with Bankers to collect, analyze, and validate all appropriate due diligence and on-boarding documentation provided by client.
